import React from 'react'; import "../style_setting_pc.css" // Import useHistory to handle navigation const Header = () => { const history = useHistory(); // Initialize useHistory hook // Function to navigate to a specific route return (
navigateTo('/home')} /> navigateTo('/catalog')} />
navigateTo('/personal_area_setting')}> Кабинет
navigateTo('/favorites')}> Избранное
navigateTo('/cart')}> Корзина
); }; export default Header;
